title: Cinefantastique Vol 03 No 1 (Fall 1973)
creator: Cinefantastique
description: Cover story on Christopher Lee featuring a foreward by Peter Cushing and afterward by Terence Fisher. Also includes articles on French cinema including interviews Jean Rollin and Pierre Kast, as well as interviews with Schlock! filmmakers John Landis and James C. O'Rourke. Reviews include Conquest of and Battle for The Planet of the Apes, The Legend of Boggy Creek, Vault of Horror, Child's Play, Sisters, Images, Vault of Horror, Sisters, The Last House on the Left, Wicked Wicked and more.
